body: Just because you think its shit doesn't mean it is that way to everyone else, I'm sure there are plenty of folks who considered this money well spent and they wouldn't be wrong. You scorn those who enjoyed this but if they felt it was a good investment they'd be getting the last laugh over you actually. As the old saying goes, 'One person's trash is another person's treasure."

*there are ppl who actually buy this shit at comiket
lmao
